minicp 1.0 API

About MiniCP A web-site with documentation and teaching material is available here.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
minicp
Utility tools for IO, Algo, Exceptions
minicp.cp
Factory methods for modeling and create search heuristics
minicp.engine
Solver and Constraint objects
minicp.engine.constraints
Constraints
minicp.engine.core
Solver objects
minicp.examples
Model examples
minicp.search
State Management
minicp.state
State Management
minicp.util
Provides utility tools and objects (file reading, exceptions, etc)
minicp.util.exception
Exceptions used in minicp
minicp.util.io
Input file reader utility
xcsp
XCSP3 format parser

About MiniCP

A web-site with documentation and teaching material is available here.
